message.name: ERR_WORKINGPATTERN_FV_ID_EMPTY
message.locale: Default working pattern ID should be provided.

message.name: ERR_NONSTANDARDWORKINGPATTERN_FV_DAY_RANGE
message.locale: The pattern day index should be between 1 and %1s.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINWORKINGPATTERN_XFV_NO_OWNER
message.locale: User, location or organization should be provided.
User, location or organisation should be provided.

message.name: ERR_WORKINGPATTERN_XFV_STARTTIME_ENDTIME
message.locale: The start time must not be later than the end time.

message.name: ERR_WORKINGPATTERN_FV_STARTTIME_ENDTIME
message.locale: The start time and the end time should be provided.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINWORKINGPATTERN_XFV_MANY_OWNERS
message.locale: Too many owners of working pattern - select either user, location or organization.
Too many owners of working pattern - select either user, location or organisation.

message.name: ERR_NONSTANDARDWORKINGPATTERN_FV_TYPE
message.locale: Non-standard working pattern must be either Non-Standard or Non-Working.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINWORKINGPATTERN_MRE_ACTIVE
message.locale: More than one active working pattern exists for the specified period.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINWORKINGPATTERN_MRE_DUPLICATE_TYPE
message.locale: More than one active working pattern of this type exists for the specified period.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINWORKINGPATTERN_XRV_ACTIVE
message.locale: An active working pattern already exists for the specified period.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINWORKINGPATTERN_XRV_DUPLICATE_TYPE
message.locale: An active working pattern of this type already exists for the specified period.

message.name: ERR_MAINTAINWORKINGPATTERN_XRV_DAY
message.locale: The selected day is not valid for this working pattern.

message.name: ERR_WORKING_PATTERN_XFV_WRONG_START_DAY
message.locale: Working patterns must start on a Monday.

message.name: ERR_WORKING_PATTERN_XFV_WRONG_END_DAY
message.locale: Working patterns must end on a Sunday.

message.name: ERR_WORKING_PATTERN_XFV_MIN_DURATION
message.locale: A working pattern may only be defined for a period of %1s days or more.

message.name: ERR_FV_NO_MODIFY_PATTERN_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this working pattern as it has been canceled.
You cannot modify this working pattern as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_PATTERN_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This working pattern has already been canceled.
This working pattern has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_WORKING_PATTERN_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No working pattern could be found for the owner, date and type specified.
